Queen St alleged hate crime: 43yo Auckland woman faces raft of assault charges https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queen-st-hate-crime-43yo-auckland-woman-faces-raft-of-assault-charges/DRJI7MUAPVFITM6MWHHXBQWYRY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queen-st-hate-crime-43yo-auckland-woman-faces-raft-of-assault-charges/DRJI7MUAPVFITM6MWHHXBQWYRY/ Police sought a woman over alleged hate crime. When cops checked CCTV, they found more. Mon, 28 Oct 2024 21:15:39 +0000 Police have charged an Auckland woman over an alleged hate crime on Queen St, and after looking into this incident, investigators found she was allegedly behind a string of assaults in the city. Photo / Nick Reed
Live: Police offer $100,000 reward for information in relation to the murder of Arthur Easton 39 years ago https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-issue-appeal-for-information-in-relation-to-the-murder-of-arthur-easton-39-years-ago/XA4IQ7SJWVG6BIGV6HN4JXUDUQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-issue-appeal-for-information-in-relation-to-the-murder-of-arthur-easton-39-years-ago/XA4IQ7SJWVG6BIGV6HN4JXUDUQ/ Rachel MaherAlan Hall was wrongfully convicted of the crime and spent nearly four decades behind bars. Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:11:21 +0000 Police have offered a $100,000 reward for information relating to the murder of Arthur Easton in Papakura 39 years ago. Arthur Easton, the beanie found at the scene and the murder weapon. Photo / Rachel Maher
